title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 June 2009 - XWiki
content:
vmassol left at 00:35 ()  
anamarias left at 02:08 ()  
jvelociter left at 02:42 ()  
sdumitriu left at 03:30 ("Leaving.")  
arunreddy\_\_ joined #xwiki at 03:45  
arunreddy\_ left at 03:46 (Read error: 54 (Connection reset by peer))  
bbc581 joined #xwiki at 06:01  
bbc581 left at 06:19 (Connection timed out)  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 08:27  
arunreddy\_\_ left at 08:44 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 09:18  
vmassol left at 09:21 (Client Quit)  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 09:50  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:05): sdumitriu : Hi  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:05): Hi  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:05): still few errors with my component. I have written a component based on tutorial writing components.   
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:06):  Failed to lookup component [role = [org.xwiki.platform.HelloWorld] hint = [default]]  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:06): I have followed whats given there. and compared the same with localization and xwiki-cache components .  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:07): pastebin the code  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:08): XE itself is not running.   
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:08): http://xwiki.pastebin.com/d6dd5faf7  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:09): pastebin the code with the lookup  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:11): Did you declare the HelloWorld component in components.txt?  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:11): Yes  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:11): http://xwiki.pastebin.com/de68edfd  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:12): Not the error  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:12): The Java code  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:12): org.xwiki.platform.internal.DefaultHelloWorld  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:12): org.xwiki.platform.internal.vcinitializer.HelloWorldVelocityContextInitializer  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:13): Arun, I want the actual Java code that you wrote  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:14): Make a package with the whole project  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:14): And mail it to me  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:15): ok  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:15): http://xwiki.pastebin.com/d7a132fe  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:15): i will mail now.  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:17): sdumitriu : Mailed.  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:25): a hello world component.  
marta\_ joined #xwiki at 10:27  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:28): Oh, yes  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:28): The role for your component is "myCustomHelloWorld"  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:28): Not the role, the hint  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:28): And the lookup with no hint defaults to the "default" hint  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:33): how am i supposed to solve the issue ?  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 10:33): In DefaultHelloWorld, say @Component("default")  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:33): ok  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 10:38  
arunreddy - (14/06/2009 10:38): Finally it worked. Thanks a lot.  
vnkatesh joined #xwiki at 11:24  
vnkatesh left #xwiki at 11:24  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 11:37

vnkatesh joined #xwiki at 12:16  
tharindu joined #xwiki at 12:22  
tmortagne\_ joined #xwiki at 12:26  
tmortagne left at 12:26 (Read error: 54 (Connection reset by peer))  
vmassol left at 12:34 ()  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 12:55  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 12:58): Hi tharindu  
tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 13:03  
tharindu left at 13:05 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:07): Hi tharindu\_  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:07): hi  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:07): I see you committed some GWT code  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:08): You should not start with that, but with the XMPP integration  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:09): Still I did not have any progress in that JIRA issue  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:09): I thought I could learn some GWT yesterday  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:09): Yes  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:09): That's good  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:10): last few days I was little busy with other work  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:10): could you able to look at that NPE issue  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:11): Oh, still that problem?  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:11): OK, I'll look at it tomorrow (I have a deadline for something else today)  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:12): No that's fine, I am just doing this to learn when I get free time. Please have a look at that when you get some free time  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:24): marta\_: Hi, still I can't publish blog post :(  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:25): when I click the publish button, still it shows a small warning   
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:25): --This blog post is not published yet. --  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 13:27): Try clearing the browser cache  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:32): I had this issue earlier also, then marta published the post on behalf of me  
tharindu\_ - (14/06/2009 13:33): I tried after clearing and also with another browser as well  
tharindu\_ left at 13:44 (Remote closed the connection)  
vnkatesh left #xwiki at 14:06  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 14:29  
jvelociter left at 14:59 ()

lucaa left at 15:18 ("Leaving.")  
anamarias left at 15:48 ()  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 15:51  
tmortagne\_ left at 15:56 ("Ex-Chat")  
jvelociter left at 16:02 ()  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:05): hi!  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:06): Hi cristinas  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:06): sdumitriu: i would like to use for my extension the code from http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/web/trunk/wysiwyg/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/wysiwyg/server/  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:06): (cleaner and converter)  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07): what dependencies should I include in my pom.xml  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07): ?  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07): i've tried : <dependency>  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07):       <groupId>com.xpn.xwiki.platform</groupId>  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07):       <artifactId>xwiki-web-wysiwyg</artifactId>  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07):       <version>2.0-SNAPSHOT</version>  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07):       <scope>compile</scope>  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:07): Yes, that should be the one  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:07): and doesn't work  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:07): What doesn't work?  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:08): i mean i got the message (missing artifact  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:09): more exactly :   
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:09): Missing:  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:09): ----------  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:09): 1) com.xpn.xwiki.platform:xwiki-web-wysiwyg:jar:2.0-SNAPSHOT  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:10): <packaging>war</packaging>  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:10): But I think that this is too much  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:10): Marius will have to split that project into several modules  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:11): Since the cleanup package should not be part of the WYSIWYG  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:11): It's on the server  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:12): For the moment, try with the war packaging, see if it works  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:13): Hm, although I think you will have to take special care of this dependency in the assembly file  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:13): i've added the war packaging in the dependecy tag  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:13): Since a war has a different structure than the jar  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:13): and it doesn't work  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:14): should i add it in another place?  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:15): No, let me check  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:15): It's <type>war</type> inside dependencies  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:16): <packaging> is in the project's pom  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:16): ok, i try this one  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:16): But it just puts the war inside the zip, which is wrong  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:17): So you will have to edit src/main/assembly/dep.xml  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:17): And split the dependencySet into two  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:17): One with <excludes>com.xpn.xwiki.platform:xwiki-web-wysiwyg  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:17): And the other with <includes>  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:18): And which unpacks and filters just the jar  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:18): the build is working now  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:19): http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/assembly.html#class\_dependencySet  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:19): i'll modify the dep.xml noe  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:19): \*now  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:19): <unpack>true</unpack>  
vmassol - (14/06/2009 16:24): sdumitriu: I'm adding an event for XWiki Application start/stop. Ok with you?  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:25): hmm.. i don't understand what kind of archive is this one.. and if I don't put the archive in the zip (.oxt) file .. how can I make openoffice to see it  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:25): vmassol: +1  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 16:25  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:25): vmassol: Did you manage to get it working fine?  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:25): cristinas: Wait a bit  
vmassol - (14/06/2009 16:25): sdumitriu: yes I think so, testing now  
vmassol - (14/06/2009 16:25): (I"ve refactored the office importer to use it)  
arunreddy left at 16:26 (Read error: 54 (Connection reset by peer))  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:26): sdumitriu: sure  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:43): cristinas: I committed changes to the pom/assembly  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:43): Please update  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:43): ok, thanks  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:47): it works, thanks  
cristinas - (14/06/2009 16:47): so the library is inside the zip file, but not in the jar  
sdumitriu - (14/06/2009 16:48): Yes
